SELECT ts.*, c.style_pic planningPic, c.his_design_no as hisDesignNo, ts.`status` AS sd_status, ts.confirm_status AS sd_confirm_status, ts.style_pic stylePic, ts.id styleId FROM t_planning_category_item c LEFT JOIN t_style_color tsc ON ( c.his_design_no = tsc.style_no AND tsc.del_flag = '0' ) LEFT JOIN t_style ts ON ( ts.id = tsc.style_id) WHERE c.del_flag = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
